get.description: Get all personal access tokens for the user.

200.description: A list of personal access tokens.

post.description: Add a new personal access token for the user.

name.description: The personal access token name. Must be unique within the user.

expiresAt.description: The epoch time in milliseconds when the token will expire. If not provided, the token will never expire.

201.description: The personal access token was added successfully.

422.description: The personal access token name is already in use.
